fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Connections: When the Merchant event arrives, you may take 2 non-special cards of your choice instead of 1.
- Shipment: Whenever you trade with someone else, immediately draw 2 cards.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Bargain: Choose 1 card. It will gain one of Reforged, Satcheled, or Upgraded randomly. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Replicate: Choose a non-special card in your hand. Duplicate it, with modifiers. [1 use, Unique]
- Control: Choose a player to draw/discard a card at the end of the phase. [3 uses, 1 CD, Graveyard]
